# Getting Started {#GettingStarted -}

## Tools You'll Need {-}

### RStudio {-} 

Download RStudio [here](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/).

### GitHub Desktop {-}

Download GitHub Desktop [here](https://desktop.github.com).

### Bookdown template {-}

Download the a blank bookdown template [here](https://github.com/gilesnknight/bookdown-template).

## Useful resources {-}

For further information, take a look at:

- [bookdown: Authoring Books and Technical Documents with R Markdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/)
- [R Markdown Cookbook](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown-cookbook/)
- [R Markdown: The Definitive Guide](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/)
